description: Detects a suspicious certreq execution taken from the LOLBAS examples, which can be abused to download (small) files Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Certreq Command to Download
query: (process.executable:*\\certreq.exe AND process.command_line:*\ \-Post\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-config\ * AND process.command_line:*\ http* AND process.command_line:*\ C\:\\windows\\win.ini\ *)
